saperavi_desc: A dry red wine made from selected grapes grown in the microzone of Kardenakhi village, giving the wine its exclusive aroma and taste. The wine is aged in qvevri, with a 6-7 day fermentation period on chacha. Distinguished by its velvety, balanced varietal taste. Recommended with meat dishes.
tsarapi_desc: A protected designation of origin dry white wine made from selected Rkatsiteli grapes grown in the Tsarapi microzone. The wine is made in qvevri using the traditional Kakhetian method, with a 4-5 month maceration period. Distinguished by various fruit aromas and a balanced honey taste. Recommended with grilled meat and meat dishes.
kindzmarauli_desc: A protected designation of origin semi-sweet red wine made from selected Saperavi grapes grown in the Kindzmarauli zone of Kakheti, giving the wine its distinctive aroma and taste. The wine is characterized by a ruby color, pronounced blackcurrant and cherry aromas. Distinguished by harmonious taste and balanced structure. Recommended with fruits and desserts, as well as meat dishes prepared with sweet sauce.
khikhvi_desc: A dry white wine made from selected Khikhvi grapes grown in the Kardenakhi microzone. The wine is made in qvevri using the traditional Kakhetian method, with a 4-5 month maceration period. Characterized by an amber color, delicate honey aroma and taste. Recommended with grilled meat and meat dishes.
kisi_desc: A dry white wine made from selected Kisi grapes grown in the Kardenakhi microzone. The wine is made in qvevri using the traditional Kakhetian method, with a 4-5 month maceration period. The wine is distinguished by its original varietal and velvety taste with pronounced various fruit tones. Recommended with grilled meat and meat dishes.
sauvignon_desc: GOGLA's Sauvignon Blanc - a 2024 novelty in our winery ‚Äî a white, semi-sweet wine, made using classical technology. üçá Harvest: 2024 üìç Microzone: Kardenakhi üç∑ Technology: Classical üî∏ Alcohol: 11%. Made from selected Sauvignon Blanc grapes. Distinguished by refined structure and rich aromas ‚Äî dominated by delicate tones of pear and melon. The taste is velvety, with balanced acidity and a long, elegant finish. ‚ú® Recommended with: seafood, white meat, and salads prepared with citrus sauce.
contact_description: If you have any questions or would like to collaborate, contact us on any social network or call us at: +995 597 750 703. We'll be happy to help!
